H0.text: What is the surname of Django in the 2012 film ‘Django Unchained’. Washington

H3.text: What is the surname of Django in the 2012 film ‘Django Unchained’. Freeman

A4.text: Django, sold off and separated from his wife, Broomhilda.

A5.text: Django Freeman is the protagonist of the film Django Unchained.
